message:
http://www.quora.com/Robert-Scoble-1/What-is-stopping-Instagram-from-being-released-on-the-Android-platform/answer/Robert-Scoble-1?srid=OQY

I don't often find myself agreeing with R. Scoble but this does ring true. Any thoughts?

Thanks for sharing the link. I completly understand what he says. It's true. Nothing to say against it.
In my opinion, Android is more about feelings. When developers love Open Source, love "freedom" and stuff like this, they will develop for Android. For example, I love my Android phone, why I just developed 3 Apps for me. But as a win orientated company/developer, I understand why you have to focus on diffrent arguments.
